sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya telah membeli baju baru dengan pola kotak-kotak.
english translation: I have bought a new shirt with a checkered pattern.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak-anak suka bermain dengan kotoran.
english translation: Children like to play with dirt.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saat di pegunungan, kamu bisa melihat kristal es.
english translation: When in the mountains, you can see ice crystals.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Binatang ini sangat kuat dan berbahaya.
english translation: This animal is very strong and dangerous.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Salad kubis dengan saus balsamico adalah menu favorit saya.
english translation: Cabbage salad with balsamic sauce is my favorite menu.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kita akan membuat kue dalam bentuk kubus.
english translation: We will make a cake in the shape of a cube.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menemukan seekor kucing yang lucu di halaman belakang rumah.
english translation: I found a cute cat in the backyard of my house.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kuda ini sangat kuat dan cepat.
english translation: This horse is very strong and fast.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kue keju adalah kue favorit saya.
english translation: Cheese cake is my favorite cake.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kuil ini sangat indah dan terlihat megah.
english translation: This temple is very beautiful and looks majestic.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka mengikuti kuis di televisi setiap Sabtu malam.
english translation: I like to participate in quizzes on TV every Saturday night.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sebaiknya Anda memotong kuku kaki secara teratur.
english translation: You should regularly cut your toenails.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kumbang ini sangat cantik dengan warna yang cerah.
english translation: This beetle is very beautiful with bright colors.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memiliki kumis tebal di atas bibirnya.
english translation: He has a thick mustache above his lip.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kunang-kunang terbang di malam hari di taman.
english translation: Fireflies fly at night in the park.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya kehilangan kunci rumah saya.
english translation: I lost my house key.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kamar hotel dapat dibuka dengan kunci elektronik.
english translation: Hotel rooms can be opened with an electric lock.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anda harus memberikan kunci kamar Anda ke petugas hotel saat check-out.
english translation: You have to give your room key to the hotel staff upon check-out.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bunga matahari adalah bunga yang berwarna kuning.
english translation: Sunflowers are flowers that are yellow in color.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menggunakan kupon diskon untuk membeli sepatu baru.
english translation: I use discount coupons to buy new shoes.
